Elita/nighlight:

"She's Elita"said Nighlgiht"and it seems that she likes to make a 
new friend... Doesn't you, little one?"

Elita looked them and giggled aloud

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
<shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade stopped for a second. "Hey, Malice, hold on a nanosec."
> She knealed down and looked at Elita. "Hey there young pup. What 
are 
> you doing here?"  She closed her optics at how stupid that 
sounded. 
> She was never good with young bots. And this was going to be a 
> challange for her.
> 
>
